channel.title: Crowdfunding on Julien Pivotto
channel.description: Recent content in Crowdfunding on Julien Pivotto

item.title: I've backed Matchstick
item.description: I have backed Matchstick, the HDMI stick based on Firefox OS. It is the first crowdfunding project I participate. And I hope it won’t be the last one. There are a few reasons why I have chosen to do so. The first reason is the open-source part of that project. An open-source software combined with open-source hardware, that is everything I like. Good philosophy is always a good point. Next that project is exciting.
